title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Course for Higher-Order Thinking Development Through Chemical Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemical concepts and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking and creative problem-solving strategies while analyzing real-life chemistry problems.
Learners enhance scientific reasoning and evidence evaluation skills through digital learning activities based on GSS (General Scientific Skills).
Through team-based project execution, learners develop systematic inquiry skills regarding chemical phenomena and effectively present results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
